snippet.description: ...The Solar System is remarkably regular, its eight planets orbiting the Sun in the same direction... the three known planets in the system orbit in a regular fashion: nearly circular orbits aligned... regularity of the largest bodies in the Solar System is striking, especially in contrast with other known...

snippet.title: Nvidia: Windows 7 driver updates to come on a regular basis
snippet.description: ...Nvidia had some very good news for customers planning to deploy Windows 7. The company says that as of today, it will be releasing regular driver updates for Windows 7.
